entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 late this morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
